attributes.action: Call on David Cameron to step down as Prime Minister with immediate effect
attributes.background: David Cameron should step down as Prime Minister with immediate effect after it was revealed he held shares and profited from an off shore and non British tax paying company.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
